description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A puzzle game for those looking for something different. 12 levels each with unique background art, music and increasing difficulty.  After the 12th level, Remix Mode is turned on to continue the experience until you are satisfied or until your awesomeness runs out and the game defeats you!
